model.name: LV Multi-Tools Embroidered T-Shirt
model.disambiguatingDescription: This casual cotton t-shirt in seasonal blue-grey tones is embellished with scattered embroideries highlighting the SS23 Show’s LV Multi Tools theme. Graphic depictions of tools in black and white yarn complement an embroidered Louis Vuitton signature on the left chest and an inside-out label on the back.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Cotton
  • Metal Grey
  • Show Fit
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 34’’ / 87 cm, height 6'1.5’’ / 186 cm
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: product care
panelInformations.description:
• Gentle dry clean
  • Dry clean inside out in a net
  • Iron inside out protecting garment with a fabric in between
panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the quality of this garment, we recommend you to respect the care instructions :
